metadata.title: Easy Rava Upma- Semolina or Soji Upma
metadata.description:
Rava or Semolina Upma is a popular breakfast in South India, and can be made in minutes. Use roasted Rava or semolina, if not roast the semolina in 1 tbsp ghee till it turns aromatic.

transcription: [00:00.000] Gather rava (semolina), ghee, oil, mustard seeds and dals.
[00:10.000] Heat a pan over medium flame and add 1 tbsp ghee.
[00:20.000] Add rava and roast until it turns fragrant and lightly golden.
[00:40.000] In the same pan, add a little oil and heat.
[00:50.000] Add mustard seeds and let them splutter.
[01:00.000] Add chana dal, urad dal, curry leaves and slit green chilies and sautÃ©.
[01:10.000] Pour water into the pan and bring to a boil.
[01:20.000] Add salt to taste and gradually add roasted rava while stirring continuously so it doesnâ€™t lump.
[01:30.000] Mix well and cook till the water is absorbed and the upma is soft.
[01:40.000] Garnish with lemon juice and cilantro if desired, then serve hot.
